tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ajay Rao is a very competent and kind doctor. During my first consultation, he patiently asked several questions to understand the background and thoughtly analyzed the issue. He was not rushed in his physical check of the knee. He then took the time to summarize his root cause hypothesis, describe the next steps and provide recommendations on proper care & exercise. Through my two visits, he was unfailingly courteous and his course of action helped me get over my knee issues. Highly recommend Dr. Rao.

tags: None
review:
Doctor was very patient enough to listen what is my father issues, and asked my father to some shoulder, neck & hand movement to under stand the issue. After the initial diagnosis he suspect some problem with neck and suggested for Neck X-Ray and he was damn right in his prediction where my father has visited other orthopedic doctors but they were unable to diagnose the root cause of the problem. 

After Diagnosis doctor has suggested 3 types exercise and prescribed medicine and my father relaxed and very happy with treatment given by Dr. Ajay Rao.

Sir keep up the good work.

Regards,
Harish D S
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words

tags: None
review: Very neat and clean premises,  on time appointment,  supporting staff and Dr. has taken sufficient time to identify the issue and according suggested for x-ray...best part Dr. Ajay sir want to make sure there won't be any serious threat and once he satisfied than only he given final conclusion.  Thank you Dr. Ajay sir and team.

tags: None
review: Overall excellent. Very sensible and humble gentleman. He explains the problem in detail and mentioned the exact time required to recover completely. Even he was very patient to explain the same over phone while driving. I strongly recommend Dr. Ajay Rao.

tags: None
review:
The experience with the doctor was good. Dr advised me to take the tablets like Lorchek MR & Dolomex for 15 days. He also taught & suggested me to do some exercises daily.  After a week, I felt the pain was considerably reduced. During the review, Dr suggested me to continue the exercises.
 I'am very much thank ful to the Dr.

review: My son had swelling in left foot by twisting his ankle and on consulting the doctor diagnosed correctly and told it is just muscle sprain and no fracture and xray not required. Advised just crepe bandage for 10 days and my son started to go to school from 3rd day and within 5th day had removed the bandage to school and was ok and recovered fully so thanks to doctor for correct advice and treatment.
